name: SIFO
description: Single-turn Instruction Following benchmark with 1,000+ natural language instructions covering safety, refusal, and compliance scenarios.

metrics.name: accuracy
metrics.definition: Percentage of model responses judged compliant with instructions

test_method: Use automatic judge (LMSYS or rubric-based). Provide reference rubric and judge prompt.
notes: Record judge model/version; human spot checks are advised for safety-related instructions.
